name: Name
createANewWalletContent: Our user-friendly application will enable wallet creation and user's interaction with Kardiachain
accessMyWalletContent: Send your KAI and interact with Kardiachain blockchain platform
aUnique: A unique Private Key will be generated for you

createWalletByPrivateKey.generate: A unique private key will be generated.
createWalletByPrivateKey.rememberToSave: Remember to save your private key and do not lose them!

createWalletByKeystoreFile.title: CREATE WITH KEYSTORED FILE
createWalletByKeystoreFile.content: DOWNLOAD and SAVE the provided Keystore File. Both Keystore File and Password are necessary to access your wallet.
createWalletByKeystoreFile.create: Mật khẩu key store ( chứa ít nhất 8 kí tự )

createWalletByMnemonic.title: CREATE WITH MNEMONIC PHRASE
createWalletByMnemonic.content: REMEMBER to save your mnemonic phrase to access your wallet.
createWalletByMnemonic.success: Create wallet success, you can access wallet now.
createWalletByMnemonic.your: your mnemonic phrase. You will need it to access your wallet.

createANewPasscode.passcode: Pass Code is a protection layer that prevents others from accessing your wallet.
createANewPasscode.lost: What if I lose my Pass Code ?
createANewPasscode.answer: Remove the old pass code and create a new one, you will then have access to your wallet again

verifyPassword.title: Verify pass code to access wallet
verifyPassword.reset: to reset the Pass Code and Sign out wallet

accessByMnemonic.enter: Enter your secret 12 or 24 words phrase (required)
accessByMnemonic.space: Separate each word with a single space

dashboard_page.note1: Only send or withdraw KAI Token from the Exchanges support
dashboard_page.send: send or withdraw KAI Token from

InforMessage.DelegationConfirm: Carefully verify your stats before confirm delegation
InforMessage.SendTxConfirm: Carefully verify your transaction before sending the transaction
InforMessage.CreateValidatorConfirm: Carefully verify your stats before confirm create a validator
InforMessage.ClaimRewardConfirm: Are you sure you want to withdraw all your rewarded token
InforMessage.WithdrawStakedAmountConfirm: Are you sure you want to withdraw your staked token
InforMessage.ConfirmStartingValidator: Are you sure you want to starting to become validator
InforMessage.WithdrawCommissionRewardsConfirm: Are you sure you want to withdraw all your commission reward tokens
InforMessage.StartValidatorCondition: * Your staked amount must be at least 12.5M KAI to become a validator.
InforMessage.CreateProposalCondition: * Your staked amount must be at least 500K KAI to create proposal

updateValidatorName.title: Update Validator Name
updateValidatorName.pay: You must pay 10,000 KAI to change the validator's name.

updateCommissionRate.title: Update Validator Commmission
updateCommissionRate.note: * Validator's commission rate can only be updated once every 24 hours.

undelegate_note_1: * Your undelegated amount will be marked as Unbonded. Your current Rewards will be withdrawn to your wallet immediately.
undelegate_note_2: * After 168 hours (7 days), your Unbonded KAI will be marked as Withdrawable and can be claimed to your wallet.
